title: Ep 169: This Podcast May Save Your Life with Dermatologist Dr. Deborah Sarnoff
itunes:title: Ep 169: This Podcast May Save Your Life with Dermatologist Dr. Deborah Sarnoff
itunes:subtitle: The president of the Skin Cancer Foundation, dermatologist Dr. Deborah Sarnoff, is here to bust some myths about sun protection, share her SPF knowledge, and explain exactly when, why, and how to get a skin check. Plus, pale blotches on your skin (and ...
description:
The president of the Skin Cancer Foundation, dermatologist Dr. Deborah Sarnoff, is here to bust some myths about sun protection, share her SPF knowledge, and explain exactly when, why, and how to get a skin check. Plus, pale blotches on your skin (and what to do about them), flexible foundation formulas, and the reason Jenn should not be allowed to cut her own hair.
